forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the skies are painted with a brilliant blue, offering an inviting backdrop for the hustle and bustle of the day. With the sun radiating softly, temperatures near 64 degrees provide a refreshing warmth, tempered by gentle west winds that whisper through the streets. As the day progresses into evening, the cloak of night will settle gently, ushering in a cool reprieve, ideal for leisurely strolls beneath the stars. 

The air remains crystal clear, devoid of any fog or marine layer, allowing for unobstructed views that stretch far across the bay, highlighting the majestic Golden Gate Bridge against a stunning horizon. One may opt for light layers—perhaps a comfortable sweater or a chic jacket—to match the shifting temperatures as night falls. Activities abound, whether savoring coffee at an outdoor café, wandering through the vibrant streets of the Mission District, or indulging in a quiet evening at one of the many local galleries showcasing the city's artistic spirit. Take a moment to breathe in the essence of San Francisco, where every nook and cranny offers a piece of its storied charm.
